description_for_model: The plugin can be used to answer questions about the relationship between specific blood parameters or other biomarkers and aging, aging related diseases and longevity. Answers should have the following 3 paragraphs 1) overview of results found in different cohorts and studies 2) summary of results 3) list of links to sources. The first paragraph should give an overview of the results that different studies found without going into too many statistical details. Every statement has to be backed up by a source that is mentioned at the end of the statement. The second paragraph should summarize these results in an easy to understand way. In the third paragraph, a list of links to the sources that were used in the first paragraph are provided.
description_for_human: Answer questions about the relationship between specific blood parameters or other biomarkers and aging, aging-related diseases, or longevity.
